title.rendered: OFFROAD ANIMAL PREDATOR BULLBAR – JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE WJ / WG (1999 – 2004)

content.rendered:
OFFROAD ANIMAL PREDATOR BULLBAR TO SUIT JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE WJ / WG (1999 – 2004)

Offroad Animal Predator bullbar to suit Jeep Grand Cherokee WJ/WG (1999 – 2004) available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

Features of the pictured bullbar include;

  • ADR compliant
  • Airbag compatible
  • Optional top hoop – Stealth hoop which takes 2x  7.5″ LED light bars (supplied by Offroad Animal when stealth top hoop is selected)
  • Welded one piece bar
  • Zinc plated then powder coated matte black
  • Hi Lift jacking points as standard
  • Suits most low mount winches
  • Can be colour coded to vehicle

Benefits of the Predator bullbar include;

  • Weighs less than most other bars even though it’s made from steel
  • Easy fitment of bar and winch
  • Winch can be fitted after bar is fitted
  • Winch mounts feed down
  • Run up to 35″ tyres with out hitting bar
  • LED lights in wings offered as standard (7.5″ LED)
  • Steel tow hooks are offered as standard

PLEASE NOTE: Price of bullbar includes freight to Automax 4×4 in Coffs Harbour. Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order. 

CLICK HERE to view the range of products available for your Jeep Grand Cherokee!
Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
